mapper.sql: SELECT r.ID as RECIPE_ID, r.NAME as RECIPE_NAME, r.DESCRIPTION as RECIPE_DESCRIPTION, i.id as INGREDIENT_ID, i.name as INGREDIENT_NAME, i.description as INGREDIENT_DESCRIPTION, ri.volume as INGREDIENT_VOLUME FROM RECIPES r left outer join RECIPE_INGREDIENTS ri on ri.RECIPE_ID = r.ID left outer join INGREDIENTS i on i.ID = ri.INGREDIENT_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RECIPES (NAME, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (#{name}, #{description})
SELECT @@IDENTITY as id
INSERT INTO RECIPE_INGREDIENTS (RECIPE_ID, INGREDIENT_ID, VOLUME) VALUES (#{recipeId}, #{ingredientId}, #{volume})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECIPE_INGREDIENTS WHERE recipeId = ${recipeId} AND ingredientId = ${ingredientId}
